name: Raycaster
headline: Research agent for scientific sales
description:
Raycaster helps companies sell complex technical products by surfacing hidden insights about their prospects. Our customers use us to automatically uncover everything from lab equipment specifications to API performance metrics - research that traditionally took weeks of manual digging.

What's exciting is how these insights naturally spread. Teams start with sales, then realize their product and strategy teams need this deep customer understanding too. We're building the intelligence layer that helps technical teams make better decisions.

generated_description:
**Raycaster: Uncovering Insights for Scientific Sales**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24, Raycaster is on a mission to revolutionize the sales process for companies tackling complex technical products. They recognize that understanding your customers deeply is key to successful sales, especially in niche markets where specifications can get as technical as lab equipment or API metrics.

Initially, Raycaster emerged as a research agent, helping teams automate the digging process that used to take weeks. Imagine your sales team suddenly having access to a wealth of hidden insights about their prospects at the click of a button. That’s exactly what Raycaster offers. By illuminating critical data, they empower sales and product strategy teams to make informed decisions that were previously hindered by time-consuming research.

What’s more exciting is how this deep understanding of the customer gradually contaminates other teams within companies. After sales unlock these insights, it isn’t long before product and strategy teams come knocking, wanting to leverage this intelligence for their own purposes.

With a nimble team of just two, Raycaster is lean but aimed high. Under the guidance of Group Partner Diana Hu, they’re building an essential intelligence layer for technical teams striving for better decision-making.

As a company based in an undisclosed location, Raycaster is taking its first steps into the market with a clear vision. If you’re interested in transforming how your organization understands and engages with prospects, you can learn more on their [website](https://raycaster.ai) or even book a demo to see the tool in action.

In a world where sales often feels like guesswork, Raycaster is positioning itself as the go-to research partner that digs deep for insights, ensuring you know your customers before you even connect.

**Summary**: If selling technical products feels daunting, Raycaster might just be the game-changer you need. They streamline the research process, surfacing critical customer insights that can help your team close deals with confidence.
